detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a flock print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide shirt in cotton poplin with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slits in the sides of the hem and a slit at the back.
Bag in sturdy, grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 6x15.5x24 cm.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy cotton and linen weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a felted hat on top.
Bolero and dress in cotton. Bolero in a fine knit with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top. Sleeveless jersey dress with gathers and elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Pool shoes in plastic with moulded ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles that are embossed on the bottom.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with a high elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with hard-worn details, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs. Wide neckline with a ribbed trim.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Wide elastic trim at the hem and no fastening.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some alpaca wool with raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, low crotch and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long top in pattern-knit jersey containing glittery threads with a collar, V-neck, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back and long dolman sleeves. Pleat at the top, asymmetric seams and a gently flared hem. Unlined.

Dungaree dress in slightly stretchy cotton twill with sewn-on shoulder straps that join at the back, and buttons down the front. Patch front pockets, back pockets, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide, lightly padded, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elasticated hem with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Extra firm support.
Straight-cut T-shirt in viscose jersey with a sheen, with a wide neckline and low dropped shoulders.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Zipped pocket and a fabric appliqué on one sleeve, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline, and 3/4-length, open sleeves with ties at the cuffs.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and pleat at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in patterned satin with a round neck and cut-out section at the front and concealed zip at the back. Wide 3/4-length sleeves, a seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Longer shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a narrow, detachable tie belt under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in checked weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Canvas T-bar shoes with a strap and hook and loop fastener at the top, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and flared hems. The jeans are made partly from organic cotton.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Tapered legs with jersey ribbing at the hems.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a small loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Fitted T-shirt in soft, airy silk jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a seam front and back.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in chunky mesh. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Wide, calf-length trousers in soft linen and viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication.
Fully lined bandeau bikini top with wide smocking front and back, a frill trim top and bottom and tie-top shoulder straps.
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Velvet ballet pumps with a glittery elastic strap over the foot and loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, narrow ribbing around the neckline and a small appliqué at the hem.
Puff pants in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow at the top and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the waist and hems. One patterned pair.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide light support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Swimsuit with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a seam at the waist. Lined lower section.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Jacquard-knit dog jumper in a cotton blend with a festive pattern, ribbed collar and sleeves at the front. Length at the hem 25 cm, collar circumference 24 cm.
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with plumeti. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocking at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined.

Long, straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and concealed pockets in the side seams. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Trainer socks in a pattern-knit cotton blend.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Small, quilted imitation leather shoulder bag with a zip at the top, one inner compartment and a metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 3x17x24cm.

Playsuit in lightweight, patterned cotton twill with a sweetheart neckline and buttons at the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist with pleats at the front, front pockets and short, wide legs.
Short top in patterned crêpe jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, short butterfly sleeves and a cut-out section at the back with a wide tie at the hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed, gently draping viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a visible button fly, fake front pockets and slightly slimmer, gently flared legs that finish just above the ankle with frayed hems.
Metal rings in various designs.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastic at the hems.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Long-sleeved sweatshirt with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers in a casual fit and relaxed style with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in a cotton weave with short butterfly sleeves and a yoke with decorative gathers. Buttons at the back. Unlined.
Body jewellery in a chain of sparkly stones that fastens at the neck and back. Adjustable fastening.
Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with flounces, a faux wrapover at the front and concealed zip in the side. Unlined.

Shirt in patterned premium cotton with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Wide blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, V-neck with buttons at the top and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button, narrow buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Playsuit in woven fabric in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps, an opening down the back and button at the back of the neck. Pompoms around the armholes, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Quilted, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a small, corduroy-lined stand-up collar and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and an opening with a press-stud at the cuffs. Two vents with press-studs at the back. Lined.
